revised_title: Improving Microscope Design: The Microscopic Doublet
tldr: The author, William Hyde Wollaston, describes his innovative microscopic doublet design that improves the performance of microscopes. By using a combination of two plano-convex lenses, Wollaston enhances the illumination and magnification, allowing for clearer and more detailed views of microscopic objects. This design also offers a more affordable alternative to the sapphire lens, which was a recent introduction at the time.
